enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: At this SBI contact group, delegates discussed Chair Ashes revised draft SB 22 conclusions and COP 11/MOP 1 decisions.
The RUSSIAN FEDERATION said he could not support a budget increase of 22 percent.
The EU, opposed by the US, reiterated that the budget should be fixed in Euros.
Nigeria, for the G-77/CHINA, said the documents must reference funding for four annual meetings of each expert group, as mandated by the COP.
Chair Ashe will consult informally with delegations.
